content:
Public channel created by Adam Topaz. Description:

Coordination for the Equational Project
Note that this channel is not web public, meaning that only zulip users can see it. We can change that in the future, if needed.
I'd like to have the channel web public, as this is supposed to be an open project.

Just to clarify, this is still a public channel, and anyone with a lean zulip username can participate. Web public just means that people will be able to view the content without being signed in to zulip.
If you still want it to be web-public, then I'll change the setting.
Yes, I'd like it to be web-public, thanks.
It seems that changing it to web-public does require a zulip admin (and I am only a moderator).
Patrick Massot changed the access permissions for this channel from Public to Web-public.
